channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics

item.title: CVE-2020-4361|2024-08-04T08:00:07.030Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information by disclosing private IP addresses in HTTP responses. IBM X-Force ID: 178766.

item.title: CVE-2021-38873|2024-08-04T01:51:20.475Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 is potentially vulnerable to CSV Injection. A remote attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-Force ID: 208396.
